# anion-chat-bubble

Chat Bubble is a combination of an avatar and a message associated with the author of a message.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                        | Type                | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `author`     | `author`      | The display name associated with the chat message. | `string`            | `undefined` |
| `avatarSide` | `avatar-side` | The side where the avatar should appear.           | `"left" \| "right"` | `undefined` |
| `avatarUrl`  | `avatar-url`  | The URL for the image source of the avatar.        | `string`            | `undefined` |
